document.forum_title: Latest World News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: U.S., South Korea begin joint drills amid tension over North Korean diplomat's defection
document.topic_text: U.S., South Korea begin joint drills amid tension over North Korean diplomat's defection Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 27 minutes ago ) The United States and South Korea kicked off annual military exercises on Monday, prompting warnings of retaliation from the North, as already-heightened tension on the peninsula has been inflamed by the defection of a Pyongyang diplomat. Comfort, protection likely await North Korean defector 01:27 The most senior North Korean diplomat to flee to the South, Thae Yong Ho, is likely to have round-the-clock protection and make a comfortable living at a think-tank run by Seoul's intelligence service, say elite defectors who followed a similar path. Natasha Howitt reports. You Might Like SEOUL (Reuters) - The United States and South Korea kicked off annual military exercises on Monday, prompting warnings of retaliation from the North, as... Reuters The United States and South Korea kicked off annual military exercises on Monday, prompting warnings of retaliation from the North, as already-heightened tension... Zee News Annual military exercises have got underway involving tens of thousands of troops, amid a new threat from North Korea. Pyongyang has threatened a pre-emptive... Deutsche Welle SEOUL (Reuters) - The United States and South Korea kicked off annual military exercises on Monday, prompting warnings of retaliation from the North, as... Reuters India North Korea says a senior North Korean diplomat who recently defected to South Korea is a criminal and "human scum," in its first official response to the... CBC.ca The defection of a top North Korean diplomat to the country’s southern rival provides Seoul with access to one of Pyongyang’s most well-connected men as it... Wall Street Journal SEOUL, Aug 22 (Reuters) - The United States and South Korea kicked off annual military exercises on Monday, prompting warnings of retaliation from the North, as... Huffington Post The United States and South Korea kicked off annual military exercises on Monday, prompting warnings of retaliation from the North, as already-heightened tension...
